src:
Obradović: Vučić nije smeo da se suoči sa tri studentkinje

05 Nov 2019, 20:45












Lider pokreta Dveri Boško Obradović izjavio je da predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić nije smeo da se suoči sa tri studentkinje koje su ga večeras čekale na tri različita ulaza Radio televizije Srbije.Ispred RTS-a gde su se okupile pristalice Udruženja Jedan od pet miliona i Saveza za Srbiju, Obradović je rekao da je na telefonu gledajući emisiju Upitnik u kojoj gostuje Vučić, video "lice uplašenog čoveka, političke kukavice i diktatora".Obradović je upitao da li je Vučić ušao u RTS na neki četvrti ulaz za koji niko ne zna, ili je emisija snimljena ranije.On je ocenio da se voditeljka Olivera Jovićević i Aleksandar Vučić u emisiji ponašaju kao da je sve u redu i pozvao novinare da pitaju predsednika Srbije kako je ušao u RTS."Aleksandar Vučić je politička kukavica", rekao je Obradović novinarima ispred RTS-a.Jedna od organizatorki protesta Jedan od pet miliona, studentkinja Valentina Reković rekla je da su oni danas najavili preko društvenih mreža da će postaviti neka pitanja Aleksandru Vučiću, a da se on nije pojavio ni na jednom od tri ulaza RTS-a."Već 11 meseci tražimo odgovore na neka pitanja, a Aleksandar Vučić ne sme da odgovori", rekla je ona i pročitala spisak pitanja za Vučića.Prvo na spisku koji su studenti pripremili je pitanje Vučiću kada će posetiti uzbunjivača iz fabrike Krušik u Valjevu Aleksandra Obradovića da mu ispriča sve o trgovini oružjem.Na spisku je i pitanje kada će smeniti ministra finansija Sinišu Malog zbog prepisivanja doktorata, i direktora BIA Bratislava Gašića zato što proganja neistomišljenike, navela je Reković."Zašto ste od Dedinja napravili sigurnu kuću za bivše palestinske obaveštajce i kada ćete iz Srpske napredne stranke izbaciti Milutina Jelačića Jutku i Dragoljuba Simonovića", dodala je Reković navodeći pitanja za Vučića.Prema njenim rečima Aleksandar Vučić pokazao je večeras da ne sme da se sretne sa studentima i odgovori na pitanja na koja sigurno zna odgovor i zato što se plaši istine.Grupa od 20-tak Vučićevih pristalica razišla se, dok je uz gradjane koji su se odazvali pozivu dela opozicije ispred RTS-a prisutan i veliki broj policajaca.
text:
Obradovic: Vucic should not have faced three female students

05 Nov 2019, 19:45












Dveri movement leader Bosko Obradovic said that Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic should not have faced three female students who were waiting for him at three different entrances of Radio Television of Serbia tonight. Serbia, Obradovic said that on the phone, while watching the program Questionnaire hosted by Vucic, he saw "the face of a frightened man, a political coward and a dictator." He judged that presenter Oliver Jovicic and Aleksandar Vucic were acting all right, and called on journalists to ask the Serbian president how he got into the RTS. "Aleksandar Vucic is a political coward," Obradovic told reporters. one of the organizers of the protest One in five million students, student Valentina Rekovic, said that they announced today via social networks that will ask some questions to Aleksandar Vucic without appearing on any of the three RTS entrances. "We have been seeking answers to some questions for 11 months, and Aleksandar Vucic must not answer," she said and read the list of questions for First on the list prepared by the students is a question for Vucic when he will visit an alexander from the Krushik factory in Valjevo, Alexander Obradovic, to tell him all about the arms trade. "Why did you make a safe house for former Palestinian intelligence officials and when will you expel Milutin Jelacic Jutka and Dragoljub Simonovic from the Serbian Progressive Party," Rekovic added, citing questions for Vucic. Aleksandar Vucic has shown tonight that he must not meet with students and answer questions that he knows for sure and because he is scared of the truth. A group of about 20 Vucic supporters dispersed, while a large number of police officers were present with the citizens who responded to a call from a part of the opposition in front of the RTS.
